content: Pt. 1 - Perth Heat @PerthHeat - The Bitcoin Baseball Team, Operating On A Bitcoin Standard, & Lightning Integrationhttps://youtu.be/OJ_FuC0dUEcThis is part 1 of our interview with Steven Nelkovski & Patrick O'Sullivan of the Perth Heat Baseball team based in Perth, Australia. Perth Heat is the first professional sports team to operate completely on a Bitcoin standard, paying all staff, players, and vendors in Bitcoin and selling tickets, food & drinks, merchandise, jersey's and memorabilia in Bitcoin.
